typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Code as string,
		Name as string,
		Code_Business as string,
		Code_Parent as string,
		Source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		Code as string,
		Name as string,
		Code_Business as string,
		Code_Parent as string,
		Source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
